quagga.input.subject: Re: Extension of Merit Allocation Deadline
quagga.input.body:
Thanks.  This will definitely help me.  --Sally 



   
	Enron North America Corp.
	
	From:  Hector McLoughlin @ ENRON                           01/18/2001 11:45 AM
	

To: Sally Beck/HOU/ECT@ECT
cc:  
Subject: Extension of Merit Allocation Deadline

Sally, 
I just learned that the deadline for merit allocations has been extended by 
one more day to Tuesday the 23rd by 3 PM. 
hgm
